import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'zcar'; isModalVisible: boolean = false; openRegister() { this.isModalVisible = true; } closeModal() { this.isModalVisible = false; } // openRegister(){ // const model = document.getElementById('registermodal'); // if(model != null){ // model.style.display = 'block' // } // } } Document
